title: Envirosax Savanna SA.B1 Shoulder Bag
features: Each bag is: super strong (holds up to 44 lbs.), fully washable (won't fade one bit!), water resistant and a great replacement for plastic bags.
description: Take a walk on the wild side with our Envirosax Eco-Friendly Savanna Reusable Shopping Bags. Awaken the senses with raw wildness, rich colours and animal prints.

Envirosax bags provide an exclusive range of reusable shopping bags and introduce an exciting new medium for the message of environmental sustainability. Design-led, in-expensive and colorful, Envirosax shopping bags carry a message of sustainable living to a world ready to embrace a brighter ecological future.
